explains: v. 拷打；（精神上）折磨（torture 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.en: He tortured and mutilated six young men.
sentences.cn: 他折磨致残了6个年轻男人。

sentences.en: The man was a sadist who tortured animals and people.
sentences.cn: 这个男人是个施虐狂，折磨动物也折磨人。

sentences.en: He said that he was not tortured or maltreated during his detention.
sentences.cn: 他说在拘留期间没有遭到拷问和虐待。
